description: A new version of the Android spyware 'Mandrake' has been found in five applications downloaded 32,000 times from Google Play, the platform's official app store. [...]
title: Android spyware 'Mandrake' hidden in apps on Google Play since 2022

description: Microsoft Outlook can be turned into a C2 beacon to remotely execute code, as demonstrated by a new red team post-exploitation framework named "Specula," released today by cybersecurity firm TrustedSec. [...]
title: New Specula tool uses Outlook for remote code execution in Windows

description: Apple has released the iOS 18.1 Beta to developers, allowing them to test some of its upcoming AI-powered Apple Intelligence features before they are released for testing in the public previews. [...]
title: Apple iOS 18.1 Beta previews Apple Intelligence for the first time

description: Microsoft warned today that ransomware gangs are actively exploiting a VMware ESXi authentication bypass vulnerability in attacks. [...]
title: Microsoft: Ransomware gangs exploit VMware ESXi auth bypass in attacks

description: HSA provider HealthEquity has determined that a cybersecurity incident disclosed earlier this month has compromised the information of 4,300,000 people. [...]
title: HealthEquity says data breach impacts 4.3 million people

description: A massive phishing campaign dubbed "EchoSpoofing" exploited a security gap in Proofpoint's email protection service to dispatch millions of spoofed emails impersonating big entities like Disney, Nike, IBM, and Coca-Cola, to target Fortune 100 companies. [...]
title: Proofpoint settings exploited to send millions of phishing emails daily
